Question: The daughter, this person Selene, was married through arrangements of Octavian to Juba II of Mauretania.
Hints: But **** was able to deceive Epaphroditus and kill herself nevertheless.
He renewed his relationship with this person, and from this point on, Alexandria was his home.
This person followed suit, according to tradition killing herself by means of an asp bite on August 12, 30 BC.
